title: CSS Box Model & Display Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of CSS box model properties and display types

questions.question: What does padding control?
questions.explanation: Padding adds space between content and border.

questions.question: Which CSS property defines space outside an element's border?
questions.explanation: Margin controls outer spacing between boxes.

questions.question: If you want elements side by side but still able to have width and height, use:
questions.explanation: inline-block allows block-like control in a line.

questions.question: What does box-sizing: border-box; change?
choices: Makes padding and border included in width/height
questions.explanation: It tells the browser to include padding and border in total dimensions.

questions.question: Which property can be used to hide an element from the layout entirely?
questions.explanation: display: none; removes the element from layout flow.
